# MoneyLoop - Wealth Tracking Platform
> Track every asset in one place

## About
MoneyLoop is a comprehensive wealth tracking platform that helps you see your complete financial picture.

## Features
- Bank account tracking
- Investment portfolio tracking  
- Real estate value tracking
- Gold and silver tracking
- Income stream tracking
- Healthcare expense tracking
- Tax optimization
- Subscription management
- Financial goal tracking

## Pricing
- Free: $0/month - 3 connected accounts
- Premium: $12/month - Unlimited accounts
- Family: $29/month - Up to 5 members

## Links
- Website: https://moneyloop.ai
- Dashboard: https://moneyloop.ai/dashboard
